channel.title: Rs-Palace Development Team
channel.description:
[URL=http://www.rs-palace.com][IMG]http://img114.imageshack.us/img114/6162/70632919kp2.gif[/img][/URL] Click the picture!
We, rs-palace.com are also the owners of www.ayudascape.com ( not done )
===== NEWS =====
SERVER IS NOW COMPLETE!!!!!!!!
Hey everyone! I would like to introduce a new site! and along with this site we need a server! So, If you would like to help this site in making the server, here is what we need.
=========== Forum Staff - WILL BE MODS UNTILL YOU PROVE YOURSELF, THEN WE WILL PICK ADMINS, YOU MUST HAVE PROOF THAT YOU WAS A MOD ON OTHER FORUMS AND I MUST LOOK AT IT - FULL =========== 1. I Forca I - Good. 2. I Metal I - Good. 3. Titch - Good. 4. Sane - Good. 5. Shadow - Good.
=========== Coders - FULL =========== 1. Hi123 2. I Metal I 3. zootu 4. Sane 5. gh0styscape 6. Newb 2341
=========== Server Hoster - MUST BE ATLEAST 20/7 - NO-IP - FULL =========== 1. mod robby - Maybe 2. master_web_coder - Maybe 3. AlteredDoom
=========== Tester =========== 1. p0nc0 2. mage_owner 3. Kitno - Part time 4. mod robby 5. Hanif 6. Whiteyboy5 7. 8. 9. 10.
=========== Client Coders + Webclient - FULL =========== 1. zootu 2. xEnt 3. Pur3 Mag3 - Webclient
=========== Graphic's - FULL =========== 1. Sick of Air 2. Sane
================ ====LAYOUT====== ================
[code] Forum Name: Position Applying for: Expierences: Why should i choose you: How can i contact you: [/code]
=========== Server Features ===========
Well, I was looking to have something like Real runescape ( all stats working etc. ) No Commands except helpful ones A unique starting area that has never been used before ( i dont know one yet ) Something like Pk-Isle and AyudaScape v3
I need suggestions. Contact me, Or, register on [url=http://www.rs-palace.com]www.rs-palace.com[/url]
The website is: [url=http://www.rs-palace.com]www.rs-palace.com[/url]
You can contact me by: Phr.ee.zex@hotmail.com
Remembers, Go register on our Forums!!! [url=http://www.rs-palace.com]www.rs-palace.com[/url]
Edit: Everyone Must go and register again on the forums, we switched to SMF
=================== Requirements for Hosting =================== -24/7 Online Time -No Lag - 130+ people -Must be a hosting pc -Must be a way so www.rs-palace.com can control the server

item.title: Rs-Palace Development Team
item.dc:creator: @xx_ch4d_xx xx_ch4d_xx
item.description:
@xx_ch4d_xx wrote:

We need more testers everyone![br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 06:59:13 AM[/size][hr]Thanks TO EVERYONE HELPING THE SERVER IS NOW COMPLETE!!! WILL BE RELASED AS SOON AS WE GET OUR CLIENT AND WEBCLIENT AND DEDICATED SERVER!!! GREAT JOB GUYS!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Rs-Palace Development Team
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“Owned Irl, post:7, topic:102483”]What you people don’t understand is that these tutorials that you are making, were made…

and When we say leeched… it is held true… if we provide the proof… then it is…

For example… “How to Make a Shop” posted 100 times…

ive seen 7 different special attacks posts

and when we see spam and copy cats… we report to moderators… Its what we are suppose to do… and the job of everyone else is… to follow the rules… and come up with something original and new…[/quote]

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Rs-Palace Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:42, topic:102066”][quote author=Newb 2341 link=topic=146297.msg1398898#msg1398898 date=1180522934]
Forum Name: Newb 2341
Position Applying for: Coder/Forum ADMIN (don’t fight me)
Expierences: As much as your little mind can handle.
Why should i choose you: I am one of the best/top 15 coders of this site (including CMs. And Sick Of Air. And hi123)
How can i contact you: EVERYWHERE!
PS
I only use PimpScape, LMAO, so if we use it I can code it 4 times easier.
[/quote]

I’m sorry, but if you only use Pimpscape, you are in the bottom lot of this forum.

L2CODE

If you could actually code, it wouldn’t matter what source you used. You could use Whitescape, make your own methods and execute them without using a command or having it run through process 2 times every second.[/quote]

Hey asshole.
I can code EVERY source. I’m just better with PimpScape.
Fuck off, idiot. And what the hell is up with your name…?

Read full topic
